title: SunnyClockwork's Artwork Hub
content:
[[module CSS]]
.content-panel.standalone {
  padding: 20px 30px;
}
.sp-art-title {
  font-size: 200%;
  font-weight: bold;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=image SCP-Logo.png]]
[[=]]
